title: I CANT ADD FRIENDS
body:
Good evening,

I play lol recently and I can not add friends.

I can not "select" one mentioned doll.

However, it appears to me that "Logging onto chat service" and not get out of here.

What do I do?

replies.body: Getting stuck at the logging onto chat prompt may be due to a connection issue to the chat servers.  As a first step, I recommend running our[ Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help restore chat features.
Help!  I don't have friends to add!
